name: queryMssqlDbSnapshot
description: Returns a list of summary information for snapshots of a Microsoft SQL database.

id.description: ID of the Microsoft SQL database.

after_time.description: Filter snapshots to those taken on or after this time. The date-time string should be in ISO8601 format, such as "2016-01-01T01:23:45.678".

before_time.description: Filter snapshots to those taken before or on this time. The date-time string should be in ISO8601 format, such as "2016-01-01T01:23:45.678".
